Code Reproducibility Training

Training material to help you create FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable and Reusable) code and scripts.

Be a part of our team!

Thanks to everyone, from and beyond ELIXIR, for their contributions to the Code Reproducibility. We would love to have you onboard. If you are interested in developing training in FAIR Software practices please get in touch with us.
